column4: If I have a box that has two harddrives in it, how can I access the second one?
has the second one been formatted/partitioned? if not you will need to format it with gparted, which is not installed by default... then it will become available
the HD was used on another box, but for what it was doing (simply a firesharing server), I figured I'd just move it.
does it show up in /media .. perhaps a mount -a to get starteed
